title: Have anyone known when the new star guardians skins going to be released?
body: I heard from the skin spotlight in youtube and saw the new skins going to be released. Does anyone know when its going to be available?

replies.body: I swear to god, if someone says "8th" one more time. If it's the 8th, that means tomorrow right? I really hate time zones.
yes, i think so. do you want any new skins?

If you mean any of the new skins, yes, Star guardian Ahri.

If you mean any skins for any champion, definitely not Ao shin for Aurelion sol.

I think it is going to be 4 AM tomorrow, I hope it is. if it isn't tomorrow I may just turn into brand and start flaming everyone
